getState.!doc: The current state of the item

getGroupNames.!doc: An array of group names the item belongs to

getTags.!doc: An array of tag names attached to the item

hasTag.!doc: Returns whether or not the item has the specified tag

postUpdate.!doc: Posts a status update for a specified item to the event bus.

sendCommand.!doc: Sends a command for a specified item to the event bus.

getItem.!doc: This method retrieves a single item from the registry.

getItemsOfType.!doc: This method retrieves all items with the given type

getItems.!doc: This method retrieves all items that match an (optional) given search pattern

getItemsByTag.!doc: Returns a list of items containing all of the given tags.

getItemsByTagAndType.!doc: Returns a list of items with a certain type containing all of the given tags.

toString.!doc: Returns a string representation of the event
Returns a string representation of the state

cronExpression.!doc: The cron expression for the event (timer.GenericCronTrigger)

time.!doc: The time of the event in "hh:mm" format (timer.TimeOfDayTrigger)

itemName.!doc: The name of the item that triggered the event (core.ItemStateUpdateTrigger, core.ItemStateChangeTrigger, core.ItemCommandTrigger)

state.!doc: The state of the item that triggered the event (core.ItemStateUpdateTrigger, core.ItemStateChangeTrigger)

previousState.!doc: The previous state of the item that triggered the event (core.ItemStateChangeTrigger)

command.!doc: The command of the item that triggered the event (core.ItemCommandTrigger)

channelUID.!doc: The channelUID of the channel that triggered the event (core.ChannelEventTrigger)

event.!doc: The event of the channel that triggered the event (core.ChannelEventTrigger)

eventSource.!doc: The Item name, ChannelUID, ThingUID, etc (core.GenericEventTrigger)

events.!doc: Provides functionality to send commands to the openHAB event bus

itemRegistry.!doc: The Item Registry provides access to the list of openHAB items and their state
